messages.title: Stand up for what you believe in
messages.content: The Tory Brexit would slash protection for workers and the environment and damage our economy. Only the Greens offer a ratification referendum with the option to remain in the EU.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Build 500,000 socially-rented homes and use landlord licensing to raise standards.
End NHS privatisation and invest in the health of the country, with equal status for mental health.
Scrap tuition fees and bring back the Education Maintenance Grant.
Take immediate steps to reduce lethal air pollution, spread across Enfield. Support a clean economy and phase out fossil-fuel energy generation.

issues.brexitEurope: The Tory Brexit would slash protection for workers and the environment and damage our economy. Only the Greens offer a ratification referendum with the option to remain in the EU.
issues.economy: The Tory Brexit would slash protection for workers and the environment and damage our economy. Only the Greens offer a ratification referendum with the option to remain in the EU.
issues.education: The young have been penalised by tuition fees and poorly funded and over-examined schools. Greens will scrap tuition fees and bring back the Education Maintenance Grant.
issues.environment: Clean air is a right. The Greens will take immediate steps to reduce the lethal air pollution that has spread across Enfield. We will invest in public transport and better walking and cycling routes. To reduce the burden of climate change on our children, Greens support a clean economy and the phasing out of fossil-fuel energy generation.
issues.health: The UK long had the most effective and efficient health system in the world. This has been undermined by savage underfunding and creeping privatisation. The Greens would end NHS privatisation. We will invest in the health of the country, with equal status for mental health.

housing.content: Build 500,000 socially-rented homes and use landlord licensing to raise standards.

leaflet.personalStatement: Successive governments have failed young people, renters, future generations, and all who rely on the NHS. We need a new politics and new politicians to make a better, fairer UK.

contactInformation.address: Printed by John Smith & Son, 380 Parramatta Road, Enfield, London, N9 9XX. Published by L. Griffin on behalf of Edmonton Green Party, both at 39A Fortunatus Street, Edmonton, London, N9 7LD.
